Subject: RE: [junit] How to start writing TestCases for Servlet testing ?
Date: Wed, 8 Aug 2001 15:02:04 +1000 
MIME-Version: 1.0

From: Robert Watkins <robertw@...>

Anand wrote:
> Any pointers as to where should I start ?
> I have 3 methods in my Servlet which I would like to test.
> Where do I start ?

I would start by reading the supplied documentation.

Once you've done that, create a TestCase. Create testMethods that create an
instance of your servlet and invoke one (or more) of the methods in your
servlet. Verify that the results you get match what you expect.

Robert.
subject: RE: [junit] How to start writing TestCases for Servlet testing ?
